PSPDFKit (https://pspdfkit.com) | Frontent Web Engineer; iOS Engineer; Support Engineer

PSPDFKit is a remote company building SDKs for document display (PDF + Images). We are on all platforms (even Windows) and used by basically all cloud storage providers.

Modern React-based tech stack on the Web SDK. Also lots of C++.

Interesting challenges since we not only want to design a great product, but also an easy-to-understand API with many customization points.

Bootstrapped company here. We make money by selling products. No VC BS.

https://pspdfkit.com/jobs
